actions.recordExtractor: ({ $, helpers }) => { const lvl0 = $('.menu__link.menu__link--sublist.menu__link--active, .navbar__item.navbar__link--active').last().text() || 'Documentation'; return helpers.docsearch({ recordProps: { lvl0: { selectors: '', defaultValue: lvl0 }, lvl1: ['header h1', 'article h1'], lvl2: 'article h2', lvl3: 'article h3', lvl4: 'article h4', lvl5: 'article h5, article td:first-child', lvl6: 'article h6', content: 'article p, article li, article td:last-child' }, indexHeadings: true, aggregateContent: true, recordVersion: 'v3' }); }
